fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select an authorized player to interrogate during the day. You will receive your results at the end of the night. Cannot be used on D1.
> - If they're a Sentry, you will learn who they visited last night.
> - If they're a non-Sentry, they will be informed about your interrogation. They may choose to either lie or tell the truth. If they tell the truth, you will still learn who they visited last night. If they lie, they may choose any player to pretend to have visited, which you will learn instead.
- Accuse a player of lying at night. If they've lied to you on your first ability before, you deal a Powerful attack to them. You will be informed if you were incorrect when using this.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you incorrectly accuse a player of lying twice, your superiors will start doubting your aptitude and disable your second ability.
